Content.title: Gergely Orosz
Content.name: Gergely Orosz
Content.bodyText:
Great and helpful list. At Sense/Net, the vendor I work we completed your test and it's safe to say we barely have any of the issues listed above: http://blog.sensenet.hu/post/2009/08/03/The-future-of-Content-Management-and-SenseNet.aspx.

We would be more than happy if you evaluated our product - it is open source therefore freely available for all, even for production.
